body: And there is also a lot of Japanese ero manga that doesn't show it. Might be due to publishing platform restriction. This ero manga might be scraped from one of it.

Why do ecchi series like these only tease. You would think at least there would be some nips shown without being covered by now. And don't give me that crap about it's a manga, there have been so many ecchi series that have shown nips before. So it's not like they can't show it. And it's always hentai artists that do the teasing in manga.
